text: A vest is a kind of clothing. It is worn on the upper part of the body. It has no sleeves. In the United States and American English, a vest is a kind of clothing sometimes worn on top of a shirt. In Britain and British English, a vest is a kind of clothing worn over the chest and below all other clothes on that part of the body. ==Related pages== * Bulletproof vest ==References== Category:Clothing
title: Vest
